```{r}
match_out_full <- matchit(
    treat ~ age + educ + race + married + nodegree + re74 + re75,
    data = lalonde,
    method = "full",
    exact = ~ race + married + nodegree,
    distance = "glm",
    estimand = "ATT"
)
```

```{r}
match_out_full_summ <- summary(match_out_full, interactions = TRUE)
match_out_full_summ
```

